subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked Novak Djokovic was ousted from the Madrid Open, 7-6, 6-7 (8), 6-3, by the unseeded Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov after straining his right ankle.
snippet: The top-ranked Novak Djokovic was ousted from the Madrid Open, 7-6, 6-7 (8), 6-3, by the unseeded Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov after straining his right ankle.
